#include<stdio.h>
inline int readInt()
{
  int number = 0;
  char c = getchar_unlocked();
  while(c<'0')
    c = getchar_unlocked();
  while(c>='0' && c<='9'){
    number = (number<<3)+(number<<1)+c-'0';
    c = getchar_unlocked();
  }
  return number;
}
int main()
{
	int t,l,max,i,j,a;
	t=readInt();
	while (t--)
	{
		l=readInt();
		max=readInt();
		j=0;
		for (i=1;i<l;i++)
		{
			a=readInt();
			if (a>max)
			{
				j=i;
				max=a;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",j+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
